reviewText: Do not be suckered in as I was on this item. Read carefully and understand what you are getting and do not make the same mistake as I have made. I purchased this item for $59.95 and there is a grand total of 11 minutes worth of material. I am just a little irrate with Amazon as I have purchased so many movies from them over the years. It amazes me as to how one could be charged so much for so very little! Clayton ParsonsA Fragile Peace: 1918-1929
